title: Anyone knows how to fix this problem?
body: I own a club in League of Legends, and in the club i have all my ''In real life friends''. And we ofc have our own tag. But after the club bug that the clubs did shutdown i have gone offline in the club. And when i go to ''View your Clubs and Chat rooms'' It says ''Create a club''. But i already own a club and my friends can go in the chat and have the tag, but i cant. So i want to see if someone of you have this problem and maybe know how to fix it.

replies.body:
There's no fix at the moment, but we're looking into a solution,  as this issue popped up after the clubs re-enable.

Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can better track this until a solution is deployed. Let me know if you have any questions.
What should i pick if i want help with my club on the support site https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?

We've gathered all the club information we need, so writing a ticket in isn't necessary anymore. 

We're working on a fix, and future updates on this issue will be posted on [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016).

Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into this with you and let our club devs know as well.  There's been a few issues since clubs were restored after a[ period of downtime](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016).  We'll see if we can help, otherwise have it tracked so it can be looked into further.  Hang tight!
